examples.text: I would prefer Stanford rather than University of California, Berkeley.
examples.label: Stanford University is better than University of California, Berkeley.
Boston University is better than Stanford University.

examples.text: I don't know which university is better.
examples.label: The comment suggests no preference on Columbia University and University of Michigan.

examples.text: University of Michigan and Columbia University are the same good.
examples.label: The University of Michigan and Columbia University are two universities as good as each other.
